title: Salute to brave Kashmiris’ continuing resolve to fight Indian illegal occupation: Mazari
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 05 (APP): Minister for Human Rights Dr. Shireen M Mazari on Thursday said she saluted the brave Kashmiris’ continuing resolve to fight Indian illegal occupation on Indian in the occupied Kashmir.
In a series of tweets, she said on 5th August 2019: IIOJK – Occupation State India under the fascist creed of Modi committed war crimes by seeking to change the status of Indian Illegally Occupied Jammu Kashmir (IIOJK) followed by attempts to change IIOJK’s demography.
5th August 2019: IIOJK – Occupation State India under fascist creed of Modi commits war crimes by seeking to change status of IIOJK followed by attempts to change IIOJK's demography. Decades of Indian violations of int law, UNSC resolutions turned into agenda of genocide by Modi
— Shireen Mazari (@ShireenMazari1) August 5, 2021
She said two years on, self-proclaimed defenders of international human rights, continue their appeasement of India even as the myth of Indian democracy exposed under the fascist Modi government.
2 yrs on, self proclaimed defenders of int human rights, continue their  appeasement of India even as myth of Indian democracy stands exposed under fascist Modi govt. Salute the brave Kashmiris continuing resolve  to fight Indian Occupation #KashmiriLivesMatter #IIOJKUnderSiege
